vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλύμας, -α, ὁ
(< Aram. or Arab., cf. DB, i, 246 b)
Elymas: Act.13:8.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.13.6
§ Elymas, [possibly] "wise one" hence "magician"
Elymas, (Proper name), Acts 13:8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以呂馬 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "一個智者"
一個阿拉伯語的名字，猶太人，是位巫師。又名巴耶穌 (徒 13:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以吕马 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "一个智者"
一个阿拉伯语的名字，犹太人，是位巫师。又名巴耶稣 (徒 13:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ê-ly-ma: là thầy phù thủy tại đảo Sýp
